nodes.text: The "Force" Strikes Back In New Nintendo Form!

The "Force" Strikes Back In New Nintendo Form! is a news article published in The Adventurer 2, in 1991. Written by Pamela E. Roller, this one-page article covers the then-new Nintendo game Star Wars, including analysis of the plot, the playable characters—including strengths and weaknesses—the enemies, and other gameplay issues.
